title: Pixie Lott cuts a stylish figure in a white vest top and skintight leather trousers
text:
She is set to tie the knot with her fiancé Oliver Cheshire next year.

And amid planning their big day, Pixie Lott and Oliver Cheshire attended the opening of sport chic brand Fusalp's first UK store in Chelsea, London, on Thursday.

The pop singer, 28, looked typically stylish in a basic white vest top which she tucked into a pair of skintight leather trousers, adding a sexier vibe.

Sweet: Pixie Lott and Oliver Cheshire attended the opening of sport chic brand Fusalp's first UK store in Chelsea, London, on Thursday

The Cry Me Out songstress teamed her look with a pair of strappy black heels which boosted her petite frame as she posed next to her model boyfriend.

Pixie swept her curly blonde tresses up into a stylish up do, and highlighted her naturally pretty features with a glam coat of make-up.

Meanwhile, Oliver looked impossibly dapper for the launch, wearing a navy tweed suit and a form-fitting black polo neck with smart brogues.

Glam gal: The pop singer, 28, looked typically stylish in a basic white vest top which she tucked into a pair of skintight leather trousers, adding a sexier vibe

Blonde babe: Pixie swept her curly blonde tresses up into a stylish up do, and highlighted her naturally pretty features with a glam coat of make-up

Only recently, Pixie revealed to MailOnline that she plans to try and squeeze in six hen dos as she talked wedding plans and trying to make it in America following her first public performance stateside.

The Cry My Heart Out hitmaker, who previously noted that she has 18 bridesmaids following her down the aisle, also admitted that it has been a bit 'hectic' trying to plan her wedding to her model fiancé.

Speaking at a pop-up Coca-Cola photo booth in London's Covent Garden, Pixie gave insights into her upcoming wedding and revealed how she first asked her pals and family to be apart of her big day.

Hanging out: Pixie and Oliver posed with a group of friends inside the event

She said: 'We did a whole shebang and I made little parcels, which is how they all found out, but we’ve done one hen do so far but I did say we were going to have six, so I need to try and fit that in before the wedding.'

Pixie's 'lovely' entourage will include her best friends from school, cousins and family friends, who she said she is desperate to find the perfect dress for.

Detailing her stress over finding the right gown, she said: 'I just want to make sure I get a dress that they’re all happy with because they’re all different shapes and sizes and I want them to all wear the same thing - apart from the little flower girls.'
